verses.verse: <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> for you have <S%H3782>fallen<s%> because of your <S%H5771>sin.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> with <S%H7725>you,<s%> and return to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H559>Tell<s%> <S%H5375>him,<s%> "Forgive all our <S%H5771>sins,<s%> and <S%H3947>accept<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good:<s%> so we <S%H7999>offer<s%> our <S%H8193>lips<s%> like <S%H6499>bulls.<s%>

<S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H3467>can't<s%> save <S%H7392>us.<s%> We won't ride on <S%H5483>horses;<s%> neither will we <S%H559>say<s%> any more to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H430><s%> 'Our gods!' for in you the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> finds <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>"
"I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> their <S%H4878>waywardness.<s%> I will <S%H157>love<s%> them <S%H5071>freely;<s%> for my <S%H639>anger<s%> is turned away from <S%H7725>him.<s%>
I will be like the <S%H2919>dew<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> He will <S%H6524>blossom<s%> like the <S%H7799>lily,<s%> and send <S%H5221>down<s%> his <S%H8328>roots<s%> like <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>
His <S%H3127>branches<s%> will <S%H3212>spread,<s%> and his <S%H1935>beauty<s%> will be like the olive <S%H2132>tree,<s%> and his <S%H7381>fragrance<s%> like <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

Men will <S%H3427>live<s%> in his <S%H6738>shade.<s%> <S%H7725><s%> They will <S%H2421>revive<s%> like the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> and <S%H6524>blossom<s%> like the <S%H1612>vine.<s%> Their <S%H2143>fragrance<s%> will be like the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> what have I to do any more with <S%H6091>idols?<s%> I <S%H6030>answer,<s%> and will take <S%H7789>care<s%> of <S%H7488>him.<s%> I am like a green fir <S%H1265>tree;<s%> from me your <S%H6529>fruit<s%> is <S%H4672>found.<s%>"

Who is <S%H2450>wise,<s%> that he may <S%H995>understand<s%> these <S%H995>things?<s%> Who is prudent, that he may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1870>them?<s%> For the ways of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> are <S%H3477>right,<s%> and the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H6586>them;<s%> But the rebellious stumble in <S%H3782>them.<s%>
